title: RIOT reporting system
body: What are peoples thoughts on letting people know the outcome of their reports? I have had many ranked games where people just don't care or try to die as many times as they can before ten minutes and you never here about the outcome. You dont know whether that player is going to do that to the next 30 ranked games they play or whether they get banned like they deserve.
